message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $20,000.  I'm confident it can significantly benefit you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm trying to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,000 is a bit too low, I'm willing to negotiate. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000? This reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate the willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. How about we meet at $14,000?
